questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the packaging, considering both the background and text?

What is the overall shape of the product's container, disregarding the spout?

What type of closure mechanism is visibly present on top of the packaging?
Describing the surface texture, is the packaging's finish glossy, matte, or something else?
What is the shape of the handle incorporated into the design of the package?
What design element is predominantly used as background pattern on the packaging?
What is the primary method of dispensing the product, inferred from the package design?

What unit of volume measurement is printed on the package indicating the content capacity?
What is the specified volume of liquid the package contains, as indicated by the printing?
What kind of text is predominantly visible across the packaging's rear surface?
Does the packaging feature any apparent seals or tamper-evident indicators?
